name: Densha Destination
description:
If you enjoyed the Ghibli movie "The Wind Rises", here's something to expand your love for it.

In our text adventure 2D game you have the opportunity to explore Jiro's thoughts while he's sitting in the exact same spot during his time as a child, his adolescence, an adult and as a retired man. What he does on his journeys is for you to decide. 

Enjoy the cozy train ride with Jiro until he needs to get off at his stop while you're thinking about life and living on.
